transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello ha sir hello good afternoon sir.
Executive: Ji main good afternoon Ratnesh baat kar raha hun TR Medical Agency se.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Sir mujhe ye janna tha jaise main mera kuch product pada hua hai jo listing hai products pe.
Customer: Usme aap usme jo prices pade hain unko hide karna chahe to kaise hoga wo jo aata nahi hai ki ask on call.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Sir ask on call nahi hota wo pricing matlab ki aapka hat jayega theek hai lekin fir wo samne se agar buyer aapko inquiry karta hai na tab aap unko bata sakte ho kya pricing hai.
Customer: Haan wahi wahi wahi keh raha hun main.
Executive: Main link bhej dunga aapko video meet ka aap join kar lo main bata de raha hun us pe.
Customer: Abhi aap.
Executive: Aapko main bhej de raha hun.
Customer: System pe nahi hun. Haan ji aapke system pe nahi kuch aisa koi aur wo nahi tarika nahi batane ka aapko jaise koi video ya.
Executive: Achha video meet ke alawa.
Customer: Haan achha aap openly main aise hi bata de raha hun aapko na phone pe hi.
Executive: Achha ruko video meet mat join kariye aap haan main aapko aise hi bata de raha hun aapko na jahan pe dekhiye pricing aapka likha hua hai kis se karenge aap monitoring se karenge ya aap mobile se.
Customer: Phone phone se hai phone se.
Executive: Phone se hi karenge.
Executive: Theek hai sir jahan pricing likha hua hai na wo pricing ko aap hata dijiye.
Executive: Us pe dekhiye edit ka option aa raha hoga wahin pe.
Customer: Edit pehle jayenge kis pe product product pe jaiye.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Manage products manage products pe.
Customer: Haan manage products pe jaiye wahan pe dekhiye products pe jahan pricing likha hua hai na usi pe click kariye dekhiye bagal mein edit ka option dikha raha hai.
Customer: Haan yahan pe yahan pe price hata do haan.
Executive: Haan price aap hata dijiye.
Executive: Hata ke save kar dijiye aap.
Customer: Nahi to bhar raha hai please enter price.
Executive: Nahi nahi save kariye ho jayega.
Customer: Nahi ho raha hai wo aayega samne likh ke nahi ho raha sir.
Executive: Ek second sir.
Customer: Product manage products.
Executive: Check ho raha hoga.
Customer: Nahi nahi hata.
Executive: Ek second sir aap bataiyega products main aapko ek baar hata raha hun main login kar le raha hun.
Executive: Hmm bataiye kaun sa product hai.
Customer: Ye product hai Mindray BC30s auto hematology likha hai na.
Executive: Winter BC30 Mindre cell counter.
Customer: Nahi achha hematology analyzer.
Executive: BC30 haan.
Executive: Hat to gaya hai ab wahan pe add price aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan wo usme dikkat nahi wo aapko dikhta rahega aise hi ki aap price add karo lekin wo customer ki side mein wahi dikhega usme price nahi hate hue.
Customer: Achha yehi hai na sir ye Mindre BC30 auto analyzer.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Ji sir isme na keyword bhi nahi add hai agar aap dekhoge nahi niche category likha hai usme agar add karne ka option aa raha hai us pe click kariye ga ek baar.
Customer: Ek minute sir ek minute.
Customer: Usi product pe aap click karoge na dekhiye aap wahan pe dekhoge group mein likha hai hematology analyzer lekin aap category pe dekho kuch nahi hai kewal add ka option aa raha hai to wo bina category mein aapko sir uska aapko keyword nahi milega matlab ki aapko by lead nahi milegi.
Customer: Achha to isme se ki agar aap haan us pe aap click karoge to aayega aapko Mindre cell counter hematology analyzer theek hai ya haan to usme se jo aapko lag raha hai ki jo most relevant hai theek hai jahan se agar aap karoge to relevant by leads aayengi aur aapko fake by leads matlab aapko irrelevant irrelevant by leads nahi chahiye to wahi aap jo aapko lagegi haan relevant hai usi pe click kar dijiye.
Executive: Jaise sabse pehle aapko usme dikh raha hai na Mindre pe click hai already.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan ye kis mein aayega sir iska keyword kya hai buyer kis naam se search karta hai Mindre cell counter ke naam se hematology analyzer ke naam se ya kis naam se jyada suitable rahega.
Customer: Sorry sorry haan.
Executive: To ye dono mein add kar dun apne paas se.
Customer: Ek minute sir ek minute.
Customer: Ye mobile badi samasya hai extra hai to jata hai.
Customer: Haan bataiye abhi isko maine edit kiya.
Executive: Haan is pe edit kiya aapne category ke paas paas mein na jo add likha hai us pe category dal dijiye category aur dal dijiye jo bhi dikh rahe hain wo dono dal dijiye.
Customer: Achha dal diya aapne is pe save kar dijiye ho gaya aapka add ho jayega.
Customer: Abhi ek aapne kiya Mindre ko.
Customer: Hmm aapne ek kiya hai Mindre karke kiya hai Mindre cell counter ka hematology analyzer ka main kar de raha hun theek hai sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm ji.
Executive: Haan ye dono main kar diya.
Executive: Baki sir koi kuch aur yahan pe.
Executive: Isme edit wagera karna ho.
Customer: Bas yehi.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai.
Executive: Maine kar diya.
Executive: Theek hai aapko kuch bhi hona chahiye fayda to hota hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to hide prices on listed products.

- Wants to add keywords to product listing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to hide prices.

- Executive assisted in adding relevant keywords.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- hide price, product listing, keywords, hematology analyzer
